content:
hl7-fhircast-bot opened Issue #160

## May 2019 Ballot Comment: Sentence is not clear to me

Submitted by Ricardo Quintano Neira on behalf of @bvdh
Chapter/section: Event Notification Errors
Url: https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/index.html
Type: A-S Clarification

Summary: Sentence is not clear to me

Comment: Sentence is not clear to me

"If the subscriber cannot follow the context of the event, for instance due to an error or a deliberate choice to not follow a context, the subscriber MAY respond with a 'sync-error' event. The Hub MAY use these events to track synchronization state and MAY also forward these events to other subscribers of the same topic."

What does "cannot follow the context of the event" mean?

Existing wording: "If the subscriber cannot follow the context of the event, for instance due to an error or a deliberate choice to not follow a context, the subscriber MAY respond with a 'sync-error' event. The Hub MAY use these events to track synchronization state and MAY also forward these events to other subscribers of the same topic."

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

hl7-fhircast-bot labeled Issue #160

hl7-fhircast-bot edited Issue #160

## May 2019 Ballot Comment: Sentence is not clear to me

Submitted by Ricardo Quintano Neira on behalf of @bvdh
Chapter/section: Event Notification Errors
Url: https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/index.html
Type: A-S Clarification

Summary: Sentence is not clear to me

Comment: Sentence is not clear to me

"If the subscriber cannot follow the context of the event, for instance due to an error or a deliberate choice to not follow a context, the subscriber MAY respond with a 'sync-error' event. The Hub MAY use these events to track synchronization state and MAY also forward these events to other subscribers of the same topic."

What does "cannot follow the context of the event" mean?

Existing wording: "If the subscriber cannot follow the context of the event, for instance due to an error or a deliberate choice to not follow a context, the subscriber MAY respond with a 'sync-error' event. The Hub MAY use these events to track synchronization state and MAY also forward these events to other subscribers of the same topic."

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

NiklasSvenzen commented on Issue #160

Existing wording: "If the subscriber cannot follow the context of the event, for instance due to an error or a deliberate choice to not follow a context, the subscriber MAY respond with a 'sync-error' event. The Hub MAY use these events to track synchronization state and MAY also forward these events to other subscribers of the same topic."

Proposed wording: "If the subscriber cannot follow the context of the event, i.e. synchronize its own context to match the context of the FHIRCast event, the subscriber SHOULD respond with a 'sync-error' event. The Hub SHOULD use these events to track synchronization state and SHOULD also forward these events to other subscribers of the same topic."

NiklasSvenzen edited a comment on Issue #160

Persuasive with mod

Existing wording: "If the subscriber cannot follow the context of the event, for instance due to an error or a deliberate choice to not follow a context, the subscriber MAY respond with a 'sync-error' event. The Hub MAY use these events to track synchronization state and MAY also forward these events to other subscribers of the same topic."

Proposed wording: "If the subscriber cannot follow the context of the event, i.e. synchronize its own context to match the context of the FHIRCast event, the subscriber SHOULD respond with a 'sync-error' event. The Hub SHOULD use these events to track synchronization state and SHOULD also forward these events to other subscribers of the same topic."

wmaethner commented on Issue #160:

## :landline: II Working Group Vote (6-18-2019)
Block vote

@isaacvetter moved the following disposition, seconded by Ricardo Quintano Neira

Disposition: Persuasive with mod
Disposition Comment: Will fix as described in the issue comments or by the commenter

:+1: For: 10
:expressionless: Abstain: 2
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:

wmaethner closed Issue #160:
